name: smartwrite-companion
description: Obsidian plugin that adds writing tools and integrations

scripts.bump-version: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const pkg=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('package.json')); const manifest=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('manifest.json')); const v=pkg.version.split('.'); v[2]=parseInt(v[2])+1; const newV=v.join('.'); pkg.version=newV; manifest.version=newV; fs.writeFileSync('package.json', JSON.stringify(pkg, null, 2)); fs.writeFileSync('manifest.json', JSON.stringify(manifest, null, 2)); console.log('Version bumped to', newV);"
scripts.build: npm run bump-version && tsc -p docs && rollup -c docs/rollup.config.js && cp manifest.json dist/ && cp styles.css dist/

author: Zander
